subtitle: The place where you can expose your work to the world

info.text1: You can register all the knowleage and abilities you has adquired across the years to make you a first line professional.
info.text2: Register all the work that you have done, upload some pictures of it or set a link to where people can see it.
info.text3: Show yourself to the world. Share your Personal Potrfolio™ link to let everyone to know you.

aboutUs.title: JUST ABOUT US
aboutUs.adrianBio: Hi, I m a enthusiast React and Next developer with 10+ years of experience in the world of the web development. I love music, footbal and I have a lot of fun creating new Material - UI components.
